titleStmt.title: A poem dedicated to the memory of the Reverend and excellent Mr. Urian Oakes, the late pastor to Christ's flock and præsident of Harvard Colledge in Cambridge ...
titleStmt.author: Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.

notesStmt.note: "Mather's first published work" cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
